LightningComponentBundle.description: Displays Salesforce Tasks assigned to the current user or related to a record, styled with Ontario Design System guidelines.

property.name: recordId
property.label: Record ID
property.description: Optional. Show tasks related to this record. Leave empty to show current user's tasks.

property.name: showCompleted
property.label: Show Completed Tasks
property.description: Include completed tasks in the list

property.name: maxRecords
property.label: Maximum Records
property.description: Maximum number of tasks to display (1-200)

property.name: emptyMessage
property.label: Empty Message
property.description: Message to display when no tasks are found
